summary: Wilbur Whateley travels to the Arkham Miskatonic University to borrow the legendary Necronomicon. But, little does anyone know, Whateley isn't quite human...
cast: Sandra Dee|Dean Stockwell|Ed Begley|Lloyd Bochner|Sam Jaffe|Joanne Moore Jordan|Donna Baccala|Talia Shire|Michael Fox|Jason Wingreen|Barboura Morris|Beach Dickerson|Michael Haynes|Toby Russ|Jack Pierce|Robert Nevin|F.A. Nichols
keywords: hypnosis|based on the works of h.p. lovecraft|necronomicon|warlock|impregnation
title: Terror en Dunwich
